hanzi-su-wiki:
際

Значения

Край, конец; опасный; встречаться; время, момент, событие

Мнемоника

  • Стена 阝 как предел для праздников 祭. Делу время, потехе — час.

  • "Праздники 祭 являются особым событием для людей."

Варианты

际
purpleculture_pinyin:
jì
border; edge; boundary; interval; between; inter-; to meet; time; occasion; to meet with (circumstances)
граница; край; граница; интервал; между; меж-; встречаться; время; повод; встретиться с (обстоятельствами)

際際RS
际际		border, boundary, juncture, dangerous, adventurous

heisig_chinese_memo: On occasion, rituals are held at the very tip of The Pinnacle.
heisig_constituent: occasion, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, ritual, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, crotch, altar, show, two, small
Keyword_KANJIDIC: occasion, side, edge, verge, dangerous, adventurous, indecent, time, when
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: случай, сторона, край, край, опасные, авантюрные, неприлично, время, когда
koohiiStory1: Many rituals are practiced every day (blessing before meals, evening prayer, etc.) Only the peak rituals (wedding, Bar Mitzvah, etc.) qualify to be called an occasion.
koohiiStory2: On occasian, rituals are held at the very tip of The Pinnacle.
jp_example_words:
際(きわ): edge, brink, verge, side
手際(てぎわ): performance, skill, tact
交際(こうさい): company, friendship, association, society, acquaintance
際(さい): edge, brink, verge, side
実際(じっさい): practical, actual condition, status quo
国際(こくさい): international
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Buildings hold festivals on special occasions.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: A festival can't be happening all the time. Then it wouldn't be special, it would just be a party building, so they can only happen on special occasions.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The occasion this time is to celebrate your wonderful cyborg (さい). It's about time you did something nice for it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Your cyborg has been really great lately. Your wife loves it. It saved the world. It's nice of you to take this occasion to show the cyborg how much it means to you all with a festival.
Ru_Meaning: occasion, side, edge, verge, dangerous, adventurous, indecent, time, when
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 二 (два), 小 (маленький), 阡, 癶 (крыша с точками), 示 (указывать)
Ru_trainchinese: jì: (графема) граница, край; внутри; между, меж-; момент; (книжн.) во время, когда; обстоятельства
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a hill (⻖) festival (祭) is a real occasion
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Only on occasion do residents of the pinnacle pay a trip to the altar (a religious altar) as they are not so into religion.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " 𨸏 ", the sound of " sacrifice ". The original meaning is where the two walls meet. "Shuowen": "Ji, the wall will meet. From 𨸏, the sound of sacrifice." Duan Yucai's note: "The seam where two walls meet. By extension, where the two meets are all days." . Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Ding Gong Ten Years": "If nothing happens between Qi and Lu, it must not be done." "Chu Ci. Heavenly Questions: "On the occasion of the nine days, will you be at ease?"

" Inter " means the boundaries and boundaries of things. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Knowing the Northern Journey": "Things and things are boundless." Cheng Xuanying Shu: "Ji, also on the cliff." "Han Shu. "Sima Qian Biography": "Every one hundred thirty chapters, I also want to understand the changes of the past and the present in order to study the heavens and the people, and become the words of a family."

" Ji " also indicates the time of the handover. Such as "The Analects. "Tab": "At the time of Tang and Yu, Yu Si was prosperous." "Han Shu. "Geography": "Strict master's disciples thrive in literature and scenery." The extension means time. For example, Zhuge Liang of the Three Kingdoms "Teacher Formation": "When you are in charge of defeating the army, you are ordered to be in crisis."

" Ji " also refers to each other. Such as "Han Feizi. "Difficulty One": "When a ruler is a minister, he is not the relative of his father and his son, and he counts it out." It also refers to the interaction and relationship between people. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "One Line": "What the ancestors hated, if there is no evil in the unknown, the unknowable means that the ruler, father and son, brother, friend, husband and wife are defeated."

" Ji " means meeting and handover. Such as "Zhou Yi. "Thailand": "Everything goes back and forth, the world is also intertwined." "Huainanzi. "Tao Ying": "If there is a god, the four links flow in parallel, omnipotent, the upper world is in the sky, and the lower is in the earth."

" Interior " means gaps and voids. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Zhang Heng": "His teeth are ingeniously made, all hidden in the deity, covering infinitely." It also means middle and inner. For example, Tao Yuanming of the Eastern Jin Dynasty "Guiyuantianju": "Open up wasteland in the south and return to the garden."

" Ji " also means encounter. For example, Su E's "Du Yang Miscellaneous Compilation" of the Tang Dynasty: "One day, a horse rides from a bird, and there is a sudden rainstorm, but the river is not wet, and the upper part is sighed as a foreign object." It also refers to opportunity. Such as "Book of Jin. "The Biography of Yang Quanqi": "Henggeng gnashes his teeth, and wants to fulfill his ambitions because of circumstances."
humanum_short_description_en: From " 𨸏 ", the sound of " sacrifice ". The original meaning is where the two walls meet.
humanum_full_description:
從「𨸏」，「祭」聲。本義是兩牆相接之處。《說文》：「際，壁會也。从𨸏，祭聲。」段玉裁注：「兩牆相合之縫也。引申之，凡兩合皆曰際。」引申表示交界處、邊緣處。如《左傳．定公十年》：「居齊、魯之際而無事，必不可矣。」《楚辭．天問》：「九天之際，安於安屬？」

　　「際」表示事物的分界、界限。如《莊子．知北遊》：「物物者與物無際。」成玄英疏：「際，崖畔也。」《漢書．司馬遷傳》：「凡百三十篇，亦欲以究天人之際，通古今之變，成一家之言。」

　　「際」又表示先後交接的時間。如《論語．泰伯》：「唐、虞之際，於斯為盛。」《漢書．地理志》：「嚴夫子之徒興於文、景之際。」引申表示時候。如三國諸葛亮〈出師表〉：「受任於敗軍之際，奉命於危難之間。」

　　「際」亦指彼此之間。如《韓非子．難一》：「君臣之際，非父子之親也，計數之所出也。」又指人與人的交往、關係。如《呂氏春秋．壹行》：「先王所惡，無惡於不可知，不可知則君臣、父子、兄弟、朋友、夫妻之際敗矣。」

　　「際」表示會合、交接。如《周易．泰》：「無往不復，天地際也。」《淮南子．道應》：「若神明，四通並流，無所不極，上際於天，下蟠於地。」

　　「際」表示縫隙、空隙。如《後漢書．張衡列傳》：「其牙機巧制，皆隱在尊中，覆蓋周密無際。」亦表示之中、之內。如東晉陶淵明〈歸園田居〉：「開荒南野際，守拙歸園田。」

　　「際」還表示遭遇。如唐代蘇鶚《杜陽雜編》：「一日，馳馬從禽，忽際暴雨，而溪光裘無霑潤，上方歎為異物。」又指機遇。如《晉書．楊全期傳》：「恒慷慨切齒，欲因事際以逞其志。」
humanum_short_description: 從「𨸏」，「祭」聲。本義是兩牆相接之處。

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city

①交界或靠邊的地方：無邊無際。天際。春夏之際。
②彼此之間：校際互助。人際關係。
③時候：值此生死存亡之際。
④當，適逢其時：際此盛會。
⑤交接，接近：善於交際。
⑥遭遇(多指好的)：遭際。際遇。
⑦中間，裏邊：胸際。腦際。
(Simplified: 际)

際字的基本解释

際
jì
见“际”。

際字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》子例切，去祭，精。］
“际1”的繁体字。
(1)缝隙；合缝之处。
(2)靠边缘的地方。
(3)事物的分界；区分。
(4)中间；里边。
(5)泛指处所。
(6)会合；交会。
(7)彼此之间。
(8)互相接触，交往。
(9)指人与人之间的关系。
(10)指先后交接的时期。
(11)指某种局势形成的时机。
(12)交界；连接。
(13)靠近；接近。
(14)适逢；恰遇。
(15)积；委积。参见“際留”。
(16)助词。

際字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　際； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1359第28
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?子例切，音祭。【說文】壁會也。【玉篇】合也。【廣韻】會也。【易·泰卦】天地際也。【坎卦】剛柔際也。【前漢·翼奉傳】詩有五際。【註】詩內傳曰：五際，卯酉午戌亥也。隂陽終始際會之歲，於此則有攺變之政也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】際接翜，捷也。【註】捷謂相接續也。【疏】際者，相會之捷也。【小爾雅】際，接也。　又交際。【孟子】萬章曰：敢問交際何心也。【莊子·徐無鬼】仁義之士貴際。【唐書·房琯傳】不諧際人事。　又【玉篇】方也。【廣韻】邊也，畔也。【易·豐卦】天際翔也。【莊子·知北遊】物物者，與物無際，而物有際者，所謂物際者也。不際之際，際之不際者也。　又叶子悉切，音卽。【黃庭經】三明出華生死際，父曰泥丸母雌一。　又叶子結切，音卩。【王筠詩】神芝耀七明，山蒲含九節。日軒若迴駕，相待靑雲際。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" sub-case cut, go to sacrifice, fine. ]
Traditional characters for "间1".
(1) The gap; the place where the seam meets.
(2) Near the edge.
(3) The demarcation of things; distinction.
(4) In the middle; inside.
(5) Refers generally to premises.
(6) rendezvous; rendezvous.
(7) Between each other.
(8) Contact and socialize with each other.
(9) Refers to the relationship between people.
(10) Refers to the period of successive handover.
(11) Refers to the timing of a certain situation.
(12) Junction; connection.
(13) Approaching; approaching.
(14) coincidence; coincidence.
(15) Product; commission product. See "international stay".
(16) Particles.

Name meaning
Nothing.
jì
вм. 际

際

Значения

Край, конец; опасный; встречаться; время, момент, событие

Мнемоника

  • Стена 阝 как предел для праздников 祭. Делу время, потехе — час.

  • "Праздники 祭 являются особым событием для людей."

Варианты

际

Radicals: 阝, 祭  (building, festival)
Meaning Mnemonic
Buildings hold festivals on special occasions.
A festival can't be happening all the time. Then it wouldn't be special, it would just be a party building, so they can only happen on special occasions.
Reading Mnemonic
The occasion this time is to celebrate your wonderful cyborg (さい). It's about time you did something nice for it.
Your cyborg has been really great lately. Your wife loves it. It saved the world. It's nice of you to take this occasion to show the cyborg how much it means to you all with a festival.
